message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, as the product is worth significantly more to me. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it. This is the maximum I can afford at this time.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, considering your willingness to negotiate. Let's try to find a middle ground.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $10,000 for the product.
